scripts.build-win: npm run prebuild && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/CliendoIOM-win.exe && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-mac: pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/CliendoIOM-mac && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-linux: pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/CliendoIOM-linux && npm run postbuild
scripts.build-all: npm run build-win && npm run build-mac && npm run build-linux
